ygData.subject: RE: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: John Erik Maynus (Azor Spellbound) wrote: I wish Verant would just leave things alone and fix the things that need fixed like Plan of Fear, Rogues and things
ygData.messageBody:
John Erik Maynus (Azor Spellbound) wrote:

"I wish Verant would just leave things alone and fix the things that
need
fixed like Plan of Fear, Rogues and things like that and stop making
classes
weaker."

I reply:

Yeah, it would be nice if they would do smart things like that. For
example, FINISH the damn cities, for God's sake! Why is Qeynos the only
city in norrath that is complete?? (maybe because Brad's character lives
near there???) Qeynos is the only city where EVERY npc will talk to you
AND to each other. It's the only city to have a message board where
players can leave messages to one another. It's the only city to have
cool catacombs and underground.

Sighhh...and why do barbarian males have no animation for when they hold
a shield?

I could go on and on and on...C'mon Verant, stop the insanity! You are
acting like the evil MUD gods of other games who destroyed a good thing
by paying too much attention to so-called "balance" while not listening
to the cries of the players, who are the most important commodity you
have. The game is fine as it is...please don't keep doing this. And if
you must "balance" things, then GIVE rather than TAKE. Please.

Saidinn
Karana server

P.S. If anyone thinks this is "whining," you know what you can do. :)
